name: Zombie Knight
description: The Zombie Knight is a medium undead creature with a solid armor class and a fearsome appearance, making it a formidable antagonist. It wields a greatsword and has a skeletal or rotting visage, reflecting its undead nature.
memorable: Its ability to withstand lethal damage using Undead Fortitude keeps it dangerous even when it appears to be defeated.
goals: To engage in battle and disrupt enemies with relentless attacks.
relations: Often found in the company of other undead or possibly serving a necromancer.
environment: Graveyards, battlefields, or anywhere associated with death.
strengths: Immune to poison and fatigue, can fight effectively even when severely damaged.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity affects its defenses and speed, making it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses a greatsword for slashing attacks, can grapple enemies, and regain health through its bite.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to drop to 1 hit point instead of 0, dramatically increasing its survivability.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 ft., enhancing its ability to fight in darkness.
skills: Lacks proficiency in skills due to very low Intelligence and Dexterity scores.
additional_information: Can make two melee attacks in one turn with Multiattack.
Regains hit points through its Bite attack.
Does not require air, food, or sleep, allowing it to operate continuously in combat.
Low passive perception of 9 makes it less aware of its surroundings.
Effective frontline combatant with decent hit points for its CR.
test_queries: strong melee undead that regains health
relentless brawler that can't be easily defeated
slow undead with unique fortitude ability
